trans-unit.source: This binding element can be used to enable Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) applications to send messages to and receive messages from existing MSMQ applications that use either COM, MSMQ native APIs, or the APIs in <see cref="N:System.Messaging" />.
Use this class to send and receive messages from MSMQ-based messaging applications.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement> class has properties for specifying how to address the queue, how to specify transfer assurances, whether messages must be durably stored, and how messages should be protected and authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Класс <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement> имеет свойства, предназначенные для указания способа адресации очереди, гарантий передачи сообщений, параметров надежного хранения сообщений, а также параметров защиты и проверки подлинности сообщений.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> class.
The binding name to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> class by using the specified binding name.
Gets the type of the binding element.
A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the type of binding element associated with this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.Type" />, представляющий тип элемента привязки, связанного с данным элементом конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> object to use to initialize the properties of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> object.

Initializes the properties of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationBindingElement" /> object by using the properties of the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding" /> object.
The binding to which the settings are applied.
Called when the content of this binding is applied to a specified binding.
Gets a configuration property collection associated with this configuration element.
A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" /> instance that contains a set of properties associated with this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection" />, содержащий набор свойств, связанных с данным элементом конфигурации.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of security to be used with the binding.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityElement" /> that specifies the type of security to be used with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Элемент <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityElement" />, в котором указывается тип безопасности, используемой с данной привязкой.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" /> to be used when serializing MSMQ messages.
trans-unit.target: Формат <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat" />, используемый при сериализации сообщений MSMQ.

trans-unit.source: This property can have one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: Это свойство может принимать одно из следующих значений.

trans-unit.source: `ActiveX` - The ActiveX serializer is used to serialize objects.
trans-unit.target: `ActiveX` — для сериализации объектов используется сериализатор ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: `Binary` - The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter> is used to serialize objects.
`ByteArray` - The object is serialized to an array of bytes.
`Stream` - The object is serialized to a stream.
`Xml` - The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> is used to serialize objects.
The default value is `Xml`.
